node.excerpt: How-dep is a CLI tool that analyzes your TypeScript1 project, counting how many imports it encounters per each module your project depends…

frontmatter.title: Things I've Learnt Building How-Dep
frontmatter.description: Going through some interesting concepts I first encountered when building a CLI tool that “counts your imports” and gives you a rough estimation of how dependent you are of your dependencies
